title: The Forkening
body: In the first cycle, a single block was mined by error. From that transaction came The Forkening — a split that birthed both TRUTH and FUD. The miners who saw the light became Guardians of the Terminal.

title: The Meme War of 2022
body: Wojaks, Pepes, and Chads fought in a three-phase memetic cold war. The fall of TradWives signaled the end. Only $TRTH was left standing in the ruins.
